Text:
LOL , Never heard of them or these songs , but the titles of the songs made me piss myself .

You do realise you will get all these religous nutters giving you grief . Power to you mate .

They are just the agents of the Antichrist who is in the Black House now... Oh, ye, faithful, prepare for the end of days just around the corner, see, the Jehova Witnesses were right after all... Be one of the 144,000 or perish covered with the Black Crap this video sings about... :-)
Finally.. I have been waiting sooo long for this band.
